issue.title: IDE with debugging for docker using ignition

content.raw:
Here is the dockerfile I created:

```
# Subterranean Challenge - Solution Container
FROM subt_shell

# install Java
RUN sudo apt-get update \
 && sudo apt install -y default-jre \
    libcanberra-gtk-module  \
 && sudo apt-get clean

# install eclipse
RUN cd ~ \
  && mkdir eclipse \
  && cd eclipse \
  && URL=https://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php \
  && ECLIPSE=/technology/epp/downloads/release/2019-06/R/eclipse-cpp-2019-06-R-linux-gtk-x86_64.tar.gz \
  && MIRROR=1 \
  && wget -O eclipse-cpp-2019-06-R-linux-gtk-x86_64.tar.gz "${URL}?file=${ECLIPSE}&mirror_id=${MIRROR}" \
  && tar zxf eclipse-cpp-2019-06-R-linux-gtk-x86_64.tar.gz
```

After building and starting the docker container you can start eclipse in the docker container by using:

`cd ~/eclipse/eclipse/`  
`./eclipse`

If you need more details, just ask.
